author: Sigmund Freud
quote: Dreams are the royal road to the unconscious.

author: Carl Sagan
quote: Dreams are the seeds of change. Nothing ever grows without a seed, and nothing ever changes without a dream.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited, while imagination embraces the entire world, stimulating progress, giving birth to evolution.

author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
quote: Dream big and dare to fail.

author: Richard Dawkins
quote: The universe we observe has precisely the properties we should expect if there is, at bottom, no design, no purpose, no evil, no good, nothing but blind, pitiless indifference.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: My goal is simple. It is a complete understanding of the universe, why it is as it is and why it exists at all.

author: Marie Curie
quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.

author: Isaac Asimov
quote: The most exciting phrase to hear in science, the one that heralds the most discoveries, is not 'Eureka!' but 'That's funny...'

author: Bertrand Russell
quote: Science is what you know, philosophy is what you don't know.

author: Johannes Kepler
quote: Dreams are not a matter of chance, but a matter of choice.

author: Robert Boyle
quote: Dreams are not without meaning wherever they may come from â€“ from fantasy, from the elements, or from other inspiration.

author: Blaise Pascal
quote: Dreams are the flesh of the soul, its skeletal structure.

author: Aristotle
quote: Dreaming offers the dreamer a glimpse into their soul.

author: Galileo Galilei
quote: All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered; the point is to discover them.

author: Nikola Tesla
quote: The scientists of today think deeply instead of clearly. One must be sane to think clearly, but one can think deeply and be quite insane.

author: Charles Darwin
quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.

author: Max Planck
quote: Science cannot solve the ultimate mystery of nature. And that is because, in the last analysis, we ourselves are part of the mystery that we are trying to solve.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
quote: Art is never finished, only abandoned.

author: James Clerk Maxwell
quote: Science is a way of trying not to fool yourself. The first principle is that you must not fool yourself, and you are the easiest person to fool.
